en.title: FE Welcomes Thai VIP's, Jean Daniels And Shalin Zulkifli At HQ BEP 19 March 2008.
en.content:
FE’s Headquarters BEP on 19th March 2008 was graced by the presence of 18 Thai VIP’s, Jean Daniels (International Long Drive Golf Specialist) and Shalin Zulkifli (World Bowling Champion). Jean Daniels and Shalin both shared their testimonies of FE’s Quantum Pendant.

 

Amongst The Thai VIP’s Are:


 - Mr. Don Chan (FE Thailand Country Licensee and TV Talk Show Host).
 - General Dato Kitti Ratanachaya (Former Southern Area Army Commander).
 - Mr. Sombati Medhanee (Thai Muslim Superstar).
 - Mr. Rit Lovechakumpraewpan (Thai Muslim Superstar).
 - Mr. Chalong Jeyakom (Famous Thai writer of 200 books).
 - Mr. Sa-Ard Chandee (Well Known Newspaper Journalist).
 - Mr. Tipsupas Potongnak (Famous Singer for 30 years).
 - Mr. Kecha Plianwithee (Thai Muslim Superstar).
 - Major General Natvipong Potongnak (President, Thai Swimming Association).
 - Dr. Orawan Kitchawengkul.M.D. (Owner of Large Medical Spa).
 - Prof. Dr. Vichit Punyahotra M.D. (Renowned Plastic Surgeon).
 - Dr. Kompee Karanapakorn M.D. (Renowned Plastic Surgeon).

meta.description:
FE’s Headquarters BEP on 19-3-08 was graced by the presence of 18 Thai VIP’s, Jean Daniels (International Long Drive Golf Specialist) and Shalin Zulkifli (World Bowling Champion). Jean Daniels and Shalin both shared their testimonies of FE’s Quantum Pendant. Amongst the Thai VIP’s are:
- Mr. Don Chan (FE Thailand Country Licensee and TV Talk Show Host)
- General Dato Kitti Ratanachaya (Former Southern Area Army Commander)
- Mr. Sombati Medhanee (Thai Muslim Superstar)
- Mr. Rit Lovechakumpraewpan (Thai Muslim Superstar)
- Mr. Chalong Jeyakom (Famous Thai writer of 200 books)
- Mr. Sa-Ard Chandee (Well Known Newspaper Journalist)
- Mr. Tipsupas Potongnak (Famous Singer for 30 years)
- Mr. Kecha Plianwithee (Thai Muslim Superstar)
- Major General Natvipong Potongnak (President, Thai Swimming Association)
- Dr. Orawan Kitchawengkul.M.D. (Owner of Large Medical Spa)
- Prof. Dr. Vichit Punyahotra M.D. (Renowned Plastic Surgeon)
- Dr. Kompee Karanapakorn M.D. (Renowned Plastic Surgeon)
